name: Flippen
description:
Flippen is a classic 2D gravity platformer that requires focus, precise timing and quick thinking. Explore the corrupted virus driven world of Flippen, defy gravity and become the master of this weird dimension. This game is also available for iOS and Android.

Features

- Easy to learn, hard to master
- 50 hand crafted levels, separated over 5 worlds.
- 5 unlockable challenge levels
- Unlockable survival mode for endless gameplay and highscore sharing
- An abstract Data-like visual style with a complementary soundtrack

History

Flippen started out as a "can I make this" kind of game. While playtesting the game with people traveling in a train they liked the game so much they wouldn't give Glenn his phone back. He set a goal to make Flippen in 6 months and release it after that.
